docs.title: Hi, I'm Seth Palkki 👋
docs.text:
Welcome to my portfolio. I'm an electrical engineer with hands-on experience in power systems, software, and data. This site houses my resume and a curated list of projects.

This site is built with MkDocs + Material (Python) and deployed for free on GitHub Pages.

docs.title: Highlights
docs.text:
• ⚡ Power & Energy Systems (OpenDSS, PowerWorld)
  • 🐍 Python (Flask/FastAPI), SQL
  • 📱 Flutter + REST APIs
  • 🎓 MSE/BSE Electrical Engineering

docs.title: Quick Links
docs.text:
• Resume
  • Projects

docs.title: Resume
docs.text:
• Download a copy of my resume here (PDF)

You can also view my resume in a preview below:

docs.title: Projects
docs.text:
• GridScout — Mobile front end + RESTful API backend system for utility grid mapping and AWS S3 updates. Python, Flutter (Dart), Flask, MySQL, AWS S3, OpenDSS.
  • Hot Dog Vending Machine — Industrial assembly line style design project utilizing an Allen-Bradley MicroLogix 1000 series controller. Relay Ladder Logic (RLL), Low Voltage Wiring.

docs.title: Grid Scout
docs.text: Stack: Python, Flask, MySQL, Dart via Flutter Role: Full Stack Developer with emphasis on the back-end Dates: 2024–2025 Repo:
